how do i get this crack fixed so it will be like rs some server have it

[code] public boolean ApplyDead() {
if (IsDeadTimer == false) {
if (Retribution == true) {
animation(836,absY,absX);
attackPlayersPrayer(40, 2);
}
actionAmount++;
actionTimer = 2;
ResetAttack();
ResetAttackNPC();
pEmote = 836;
IsDeadTimer = true;

	}
		if (actionTimer <= 2 && IsDeadTimer == true) {
			if(InArena){
			for(int r=0; r<playerEquipment.length; r++) {
			try {
			int item = playerEquipment[r];
			if((item > 0) && (item < 20000)) {
			remove(item, r);
			}
			} catch(Exception e) { sendMessage(""); }
			}[/code]
